member.exception: The text writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(System.Char)
member.summary: Writes a character followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.param: The character to write to the text stream.
member.exception: The text writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(System.Char[])
member.summary: Writes an array of characters followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.param: The character array to write to the text stream. If the character array is null, only the line terminator is written.
member.exception: The text writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Writes a subarray of characters followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.param: The character array to write data from.
The character position in the buffer at which to start retrieving data.
The number of characters to write.
member.exception: The plus is greater than the buffer length.
The text writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.

member.name: M:System.IO.TextWriter.WriteLineAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a string followed by a line terminator asynchronously to the text string or stream.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
member.param: The string to write. If the value is null, only a line terminator is written.
member.exception: The text writer is currently in use by a previous write operation.
